cause.description:
Of Integrity exists to help people along the path to living with greater integrity. If you want to make a difference in the world, a change for the better, you must first begin by changing yourself. This cause is here to provide you with guidance to assisting yourself and others towards the goal of being a better person.
This organization is not affiliated with any religion.
1. Integrity must start with you.
2. Be the change in the world you wish to see.
3. Stop living hypocritically, start living with sincerity.
cause.mission: To create awareness that personal integrity is an absolute necessity and to help people infuse core moral values in their life through shifting the way they think.
cause.name: Of Integrity . org
